pages.text: Through my exploration into occult magic I have designed a way to bring life back home from Everbright. This is done through the creation of a gateway connecting both dimensions. These gateways bring with them scores of enemies that need to be dealt with, but after all of them are defeated the energy here lightens, just a bit.$(br2)I opened the gateway and dealt

with the monsters a few days ago. When I wander around outside I notice new life around me, creatures like dolphins and turtles and fish. This is so incredible, I can't believe it!$(br2)Maybe there are other places I should explore. Maybe there are more stories that will help me understand what happened here, and maybe I can bring the life I find back here.
